CommentBody: The customer asked to reschedule the meeting

In today's meeting, we reviewed the settings for the Notification in AIC and discovered that the mail server information was missing. We added the info and sent a test to your inbox, which was successfully delivered.
We will work on the weak password issue in our next meeting.

I reviewed the Weak Password job and noticed it pointed to the wrong host list. I changed the host list and pointed to the same host list as the ADI job.
The Weak Password job failed to update the dictionary automatically. I collected the log, will review it, and get back to the customer.
In today's meeting, we collaboratively reviewed the Report and added the exemption column that was missing
